targets.query: SELECT mean("total_avail_bytes") /  mean("total_bytes") * 100 FROM "ceph_usage" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("num_osds") - mean("num_in_osds")  FROM "ceph_osdmap" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("num_osds") - mean("num_up_osds")  FROM "ceph_osdmap" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
